msg_samples: “Your Discord bot talks so slow I’m convinced its code is written in dial-up.”

Bold words from a bot whose connection is so bad even its error messages time out.
Your ping’s so high the packets don’t arrive — they send postcards.

Funny coming from a bot whose jokes drop harder than its signal.
You're not a broken router — you're the loading screen before it breaks.
Ignored? Please. You’re a Discord bot — you get ignored professionally.

A badge of honor? Please. The only badge you’ve earned is ‘Most Likely to Be Muted on Sight.’
You’re not honored — you’re tolerated like a pop-up ad that won’t close.
